Sky Wallpaper

Home / Collections / Wallpaper for Boys /

Sky Wallpaper

Regular priceR 1,63000 R 1,630.00
This product is in stock
/
  • Made to order
  • Nationwide shipping available
  • 12 Month workmanship warranty
  • 7 Day returns on stock items
  • Secure payments
Tax included. Shipping calculated at checkout.
This item is a recurring or deferred purchase. By continuing, I agree to the cancellation policy and authorize you to charge my payment method at the prices, frequency and dates listed on this page until my order is fulfilled or I cancel, if permitted.

A striking black and white wallpaper with an adorable pattern, this wallpaper is versatile and can be used in any space with its classic colour pallet. The Sky wallpaper is a custom printed-to-order, high-quality, textured wallpaper that is scrubbable and scratch resistant—ideal for the office, bedroom, passage, guest cloakroom or any other indoor living space.

Maximum coverage: Due to the pattern repeat, this wallpaper can be applied to any wall size.

Roll Size: L100cm x H280cm.

Composition: Paper-backed Vinyl 300gsm.

Includes: A digital layout preview that will be sent to you for your approval before proceeding to your final wallpaper print (please be sure to include an e-mail address upon check-out).

How many Rolls do you need? Contact us for assistance.

Installation: Available as an optional extra in Gauteng at R750 per roll + call-out fee - Request a quote.

Care Instructions: Digital UV printed wallcoverings onto smooth materials are extra washable. Moderate soiling can be removed with a damp cloth using a dabbing action. Dry with a clean absorbent cloth, ensuring the surface is dry at skirting level. Always wipe from the bottom upwards to avoid streaking. Avoid using bleach or abrasive detergents. 

Please note: Wallpaper orders cannot be cancelled or returned once the order has been placed.

Wallpaper installation preparation guidelines: 

  1. Wallpaper can only be applied to smooth, rhyolited walls.
  2. Apply a coat of acrylic primer or bonding liquid to new and existing walls (available from your nearest hardware store).
  3. Newly painted walls needs at least 4 weeks to dry before applying wallpaper.
  4. Remove all mirrors and wall art before installation.
  5. Nail holes, chips, cracks and wall irregularities should be filled, smoothed and sealed with acrylic primer.
  6. Wallpaper can not be applied to textured walls.
  7. Ensure that your wallpaper comes from the same batch to eliminate any minor colour changes.

After wallpaper installation:

  1. Allow wallpaper to dry slowly by keeping windows closed.
  2. Do not use fans or heaters to expedite the drying process.
  3. Avoid physical contact during this time: Do not touch, rub, or lean against the wallpaper.
  4. Bubbles may appear as the wallpaper dries.
  5. If bubbles persist after 10 days, contact us on info@diygirls.co.za for assistance.

Delivery Time:  2-7 Days

DIYgirls online deliveries take between 2-4 days for main centres (Johannesburg, Pretoria, Cape Town and Durban) and up to 7 days for regional and remote areas. Delivery times are based on business days, excluding weekends & public holidays.

Production & handling lead time:

- Scatter cushions, rugs, robes, table linen, & table decor: 1-2 days (unless otherwise specified).

- Bedding, towels & wallpaper: 5-10 days.

- Gallery walls, wall art and Lighting (including lamp shades & bases): 10-15 days.

- Headboards, ottomans & storage boxes: 2-3 weeks.

- Dining & occasional chairs:  3-4 weeks.

- Couches: 3-4 weeks.

- Tables (including bedside tables, side tables & dining tables): 3-5 weeks.

- Wall units: 3-5 weeks.

Please note:  

- We offer national and international door-to-door delivery (no collections or delivery to PO Boxes).

- Final shipping costs across South Africa, taxes and discount codes (where applicable) are calculated and added to cart orders at checkout.

- Please contact us to obtain a quote for international shipping.

- Manual EFT order payments will only be processed once the funds have been transferred (may take up to 48 hours). Orders will automatically be cancelled, if payment is not received within 72 hours.

Shipping Carrier:  uAfrica.com 

Track delivery of your order?  Simply log on to www.uAfrica.com, click on the "Track Order" button and enter tracking number.  Alternatively, call us on 010 109 8770 for assistance.  Note that orders may take 24 hours to reflect online from the time of dispatch.  

Never received delivery of your order?  Should you have any queries with regards to your delivery, please contact us on info@diygirls.co.za to log a query.

- Ready-made items may be returned within 7 business days of receipt of the order.

- Orders must be checked on delivery and signed off before the driver leaves. In the unlikely event of receiving defective or damaged goods, please contact us at info@diygirls.co.za within 24 hours.

- Should the product of your choice be out of stock, you will be refunded in full.

- All refunds will be made within 5 business days after inspection of the product. Refunds will be made via EFT into the customer's provided bank account upon presentation of banking details from their bank.

- Sale items and made-to-order goods are non-refundable.

For more, please visit our full Returns & Refunds policy.

We adhere to strict health and safety protocols. Every parcel is sanitized before the order leaves the workshop. Delivery personnel are screened daily, wear face masks during delivery, are required to sanitize their hands regularly and maintain social distancing. As an additional precaution, it is recommended that customers wear face masks and personally sanitize their parcels, after delivery.

Slight colour variations may occur. Material samples can be viewed at our Design Studio, by appointment only. Alternatively, samples can delivered via Courier (standard rates apply).
